DataElement.preferredName: Tobacco Use Adult e-Cigarette Flavor Preference Questionnaire Assessment Text
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Use of tobacco in any form i.e. smoking, chewing or sniffing._A human who has reached reproductive age._Finely cut tobacco encased in a wrapper of thin paper and rolled for smoking._A solution of essential constituents of a complex material; a substance removed from another substance._The act, fact, or principle of giving advantages to some particular person, object, or course of action over others; designated as more desirable._Predetermined sets of questions used to collect data - clinical data, social status, occupational group, etc. The term is often applied to a self-completed survey instrument._a free text field to specify information on the evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Tobacco Use Adult Electronic Cigarette Flavor Preference Questionnaire
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Use of tobacco in any form i.e. smoking, chewing or sniffing._A human who has reached reproductive age._Finely cut tobacco encased in a wrapper of thin paper and rolled for smoking._A battery-powered electronic device designed to atomize a nicotine-containing liquid solution for inhalation in a manner that simulates smoking a tobacco cigarette._The distinctive taste of something as detected in the mouth and also by the nose._The act, fact, or principle of giving advantages to some particular person, object, or course of action over others; designated as more desirable._Predetermined sets of questions used to collect data - clinical data, social status, occupational group, etc. The term is often applied to a self-completed survey instrument.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Use of tobacco in any form i.e. smoking, chewing or sniffing.

Concepts.definition: Use of tobacco in any form, e.g., smoking, chewing or sniffing.

Property.preferredName: Adult Electronic Cigarette Flavor Preference Questionnaire
Property.preferredDefinition: A human who has reached reproductive age.:A battery-powered electronic device designed to atomize a nicotine-containing liquid solution for inhalation in a manner that simulates smoking a tobacco cigarette.:The distinctive taste of something as detected in the mouth and also by the nose.:The act, fact, or principle of giving advantages to some particular person, object, or course of action over others; designated as more desirable.:Predetermined sets of questions used to collect data - clinical data, social status, occupational group, etc. The term is often applied to a self-completed survey instrument.

Concepts.definition: An age group comprised of humans who have reached reproductive age.
A battery-powered electronic device designed to atomize a nicotine-containing liquid solution for inhalation in a manner that simulates smoking a tobacco cigarette.
The distinctive taste of something as detected in the mouth and also by the nose.
The act, fact, or principle of giving advantages to some particular person, object, or course of action over others; designated as more desirable.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: Changed from caBIG to PhenX for PANH by script 2015-12-21

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: a free text field to specify information on the evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Text; the words of something written.
